wikipedia_page.main:
Charles Guy Pym (11 February 1841 – 12 November 1918) was a British Conservative Party politician.Charles Guy Pym was born in Willian, the younger son of Rev. William Pym and Sophie Gambier. His grandfather Francis Pym had been MP for Bedfordshire.Charles Pym was educated at Rossall School. He was Member of Parliament (MP) for Bedford from 1895 to 1906. He was a Grand Councillor in the Primrose League.
He died aged 77.
